scripts.example:dev: npm run copy-readme-files && npm -C examples/multiple-pages run dev
scripts.example:build: npm run copy-readme-files && npm -C examples/multiple-pages run build
scripts.example:serve: npm run copy-readme-files && npm -C examples/multiple-pages run serve
scripts.example:store:dev: npm run copy-readme-files && npm -C examples/multiple-pages-with-store run dev
scripts.example:store:build: npm run copy-readme-files && npm -C examples/multiple-pages-with-store run build
scripts.example:store:serve: npm run copy-readme-files && npm -C examples/multiple-pages-with-store run serve
scripts.example:i18n:dev: npm run copy-readme-files && npm -C examples/multiple-pages-i18n run dev
scripts.example:i18n:build: npm run copy-readme-files && npm -C examples/multiple-pages-i18n run build
scripts.example:i18n:serve: npm run copy-readme-files && npm -C examples/multiple-pages-i18n run serve
scripts.example:i18n:build-serve: npm run copy-readme-files && npm -C examples/multiple-pages-i18n run build-serve
scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsup src/index.ts src/client/i18n.ts src/client/single-page.ts src/node/cli.ts --dts --format cjs,esm && npm run copy-dts
